title: The Traitors NZ recap week four: Is this the best traitor in all of TV history?
content:encoded:
Join Jane Yee, Alex Casey and Duncan Greive as they dissect week four of Three's murderous reality show, including a blackmail, a kidnapping and a curious character called Zugaballantyne.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
